basic.description: Review of MOS transistor structure and operation; overview of wafer processing and device implementation, layout and design rules. CMOS gate design; static and dynamic logic; modelling of transients and delays. Clocked circuits; interconnect effects, and I/O. Memory and programmable logic arrays. Technology scaling effects; design styles and flow.
basic.subject: ELEC
basic.title: Digital Int Circuit Eng

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of ELEC353 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program.
